data.name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Kawaii Cute Goddesses
data.detailed_description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Kawaii Cute Goddesses" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Nike - Goddess of Victory -
  • Mercury - Goddess of Financial Gain -
  • Amaterasu - Goddess of the Sun -
  • Nyx - Goddess of the Night -
  • Janus - Goddess of Gates and Doors -
  • Chrono - Goddess of Time -
  • Tsukuyomi - Goddess of the Moon -
  • Thanatos - Goddess of Death -
  • Heimdallr - Goddess of Lights -
  • Yata-Garasu - Incarnation of the Sun -

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Core2 duo or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Core2 duo or higer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB VRAM or higer
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
